verses.text: Truly my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w waiteth|strong="H1747"\w* upon \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: from him \add cometh\add* my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.\f + \fr 62.1 \ft Truly: or, Only\f*\f + \fr 62.1 \ft waiteth: Heb. is silent\f*

He only \add is\add* my \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* and my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*; \add he is\add* my \w defence|strong="H4869"\w*; I shall not be \w greatly|strong="H7227"\w* \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*.\f + \fr 62.2 \ft defence: Heb. high place\f*

How long will ye imagine \w mischief|strong="H2050"\w* against a \w man|strong="H0376"\w*? ye shall be \w slain|strong="H7523"\w* all of you: as a \w bowing|strong="H5186"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \add shall ye be, and as\add* a \w tottering|strong="H1760"\w* \w fence|strong="H1447"\w*.

They only \w consult|strong="H3289"\w* to cast \add him\add* \w down|strong="H5080"\w* from his \w excellency|strong="H7613"\w*: they \w delight|strong="H7521"\w* in \w lies|strong="H3577"\w*: they \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* with their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, but they \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* \w inwardly|strong="H7130"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.\f + \fr 62.4 \ft inwardly: Heb. in their inward parts\f*
My \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w wait|strong="H1826"\w* thou only upon \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; for my \w expectation|strong="H8615"\w* \add is\add* from him.
He only \add is\add* my \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* and my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*: \add he is\add* my \w defence|strong="H4869"\w*; I shall not be \w moved|strong="H4131"\w*.

In \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* my \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w* and my \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*: the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* of my \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*, \add and\add* my \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w*, \add is\add* in \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Trust|strong="H0982"\w* in him at all \w times|strong="H6256"\w*; \add ye\add* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, pour \w out|strong="H8210"\w* your \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* a \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w* for us. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

Surely \w men|strong="H0120"\w* of low degree \add are\add* \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*, \add and\add* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of high degree \add are\add* a \w lie|strong="H3577"\w*: to be \w laid|strong="H5927"\w* in the \w balance|strong="H3976"\w*, they \add are\add* \w altogether|strong="H3162"\w* \add lighter\add* than \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*.\f + \fr 62.9 \ft altogether: or, alike\f*

\w Trust|strong="H0982"\w* not in \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w*, and become not \w vain|strong="H1891"\w* in \w robbery|strong="H1498"\w*: if \w riches|strong="H2428"\w* \w increase|strong="H5107"\w*, \w set|strong="H7896"\w* not your \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add upon them\add*.

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w once|strong="H0259"\w*; \w twice|strong="H8147"\w* have I \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2098"\w*; that \w power|strong="H5797"\w* \add belongeth\add* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 62.11 \ft power: or, strength\f*

Also unto thee, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, \add belongeth\add* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*: for thou \w renderest|strong="H7999"\w* to every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* according to his \w work|strong="H4639"\w*.
